question: Ghaznavid Empire was defeated by which of the following at the Battle of Dandanqan?
explanation: The Battle of Dandanaqan was fought in 1040 A.D. between the Seljuqs Turks and the Ghaznavid Empire near the city of Merv. Masud suffered a disastrous defeat at the Battle of Dandanqan resulting in the loss of all Ghaznavid territories in Iran and Central Asia to the Seljuqs.
